amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the chronic disease prevention and health promotion program by $3 million to be directed towards colorectal cancer and decrease funding by $3 million for the HHS General Departmental Management account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 74 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for the chronic disease prevention and health promotion program by $3 million to be directed towards colorectal cancer and decrease funding by $3 million for the HHS General Departmental Management account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A068) Agreed to by recorded vote: 364 - 54 (Roll no. 317).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A068) Agreed to by recorded vote: 364 - 54 (Roll no. 317).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A068) offered by Ms. Spanberger.
